sentence.text: A case with severe rhabdomyolysis and renal failure associated with cerivastatin-gemfibrozil combination therapy--a case report.
Gemfibrozil-statin combination therapy is a well-known risk factor for myopathy and rhabdomyolysis
Cerivastatin is a currently available statin with dual elimination; it is therefore expected to cause less drug-drug interaction
This case is the second reported case with severe rhabdomyolysis caused by cerivastatin-gemfibrozil combination
Moreover, in this case, the rhabdomyolysis was more severe and caused severe renal failure and death
The authors discuss how these drugs cause rhabdomyolysis and how rhabdomyolysis can cause renal failure
